WKT (Well-Known Text)

Well-Known Text is a text representation of a geometry, designed by OGC. Well-Known Text can represent a point, a linestring, a polygon, or multi versions of those.

Well-Known Text is used in the databases:

  • PostGreSQL
  • MySQL
  • SQL Server 2008

WKT is explained in Wikipedia: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Well-known_text

Note:
WKT points are comma-separated, coordinates are space-separated.
